snippet: A political opposition leader said Thursday that dozens of people had been injured and others arrested in protests over electoral changes.
abstract: Zeus Atta Mensah Ajavon, leader of the opposition coalition in Togo, says that dozens of people have been injured and others arrested in three days of protests over electoral changes that the opposition claims favor the governing party's candidates.
lead_paragraph: A political opposition leader said Thursday that dozens of people had been injured and others arrested in protests over electoral changes.
